com.jack.dicewars.dice_wars.game.progression

Interface Phase

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractPhase, AttackPhase, EffectPhase, ReinforcePhase

    public interface Phase
    A phase that knows about what is occurring during it, how to keep track of territories, and what kinds of territories it wants to keep track of.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Map filters()
      Returns a set of filters on data that can be queried from a Board and Territories.
      void pushTerritory(TerritoryBorder territory)
      Appends territories to the end of a list for well ordered consumption by Phase implementation.
      java.lang.String toString()
